nodes.label: Hematoma on Right Aspect of Neck

edges.label: has condition
edges.detailed_description: The patient has a history of factor VIII deficiency.
edges.facts_and_info: Factor VIII deficiency is a bleeding disorder that affects the blood's ability to clot.

edges.label: experiencing
edges.detailed_description: The patient is experiencing right flank bruising and pain.
edges.facts_and_info: Right flank bruising and pain are symptoms of a possible internal bleeding.

edges.label: involved in
edges.detailed_description: The patient was involved in a snowboarding accident.
edges.facts_and_info: Snowboarding accidents can cause injuries that may lead to internal bleeding.

edges.label: causes
edges.detailed_description: Factor VIII deficiency can cause hematoma on the right aspect of the neck.
edges.facts_and_info: Hematoma is a possible complication of factor VIII deficiency.

edges.label: causes
edges.detailed_description: Factor VIII deficiency can cause hematoma on the right flank.
edges.facts_and_info: Hematoma is a possible complication of factor VIII deficiency.

edges.label: leads to
edges.detailed_description: Right flank bruising and pain can lead to low hemoglobin levels.
edges.facts_and_info: Low hemoglobin levels are a possible complication of internal bleeding.

edges.label: received treatment
edges.detailed_description: The patient received DDAVP IV treatment.
edges.facts_and_info: DDAVP is a medication used to treat bleeding disorders such as factor VIII deficiency.

edges.label: taking medication
edges.detailed_description: The patient is taking desmopressin nasal medication.
edges.facts_and_info: Desmopressin is a medication used to treat bleeding disorders such as factor VIII deficiency.

edges.label: taking medication
edges.detailed_description: The patient is taking acetaminophen medication.
edges.facts_and_info: Acetaminophen is a pain reliever used to treat pain caused by internal bleeding.
